SOUTHEASTERN TYRRHENIAN SEA.
MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V SERENADE OF THE SEAS
IN 39-10N 015-07E AT 122300Z OCT. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
